thread.title_full: Obama To Unveil ‘The Biggest, Most Important Step We've Ever Taken To Combat Climate Change’ - Fox Nation

title: Obama To Unveil ‘The Biggest, Most Important Step We've Ever Taken To Combat Climate Change’ - Fox Nation
text:
Obama To Unveil ‘The Biggest, Most Important Step We've Ever Taken To Combat Climate Change’ Published August 2, 2015 
By Jordan Fabian and Tim Cama , The Hill 
President Obama is looking to cement his legacy on climate change. 
His administration will finalize sweeping new regulations on power plants on Monday, which is sure to spark a fight with Republicans in Congress. BREAKING: On Monday, @POTUS will release his #CleanPowerPlan —the biggest step we've ever taken to #ActOnClimate . https://t.co/BU1PF0wjUK
